page.title: 11Hotel Complex & Sports Clubs
page.content: BROUGHTON PARK- A6 North of Roundabout Once a private house now a complex with an hotel, conference centre, restaurant and 'Drakes' a health and leisure club. Drakes, a private club, has a fully equipped gymnasium and offers saunas, sunbeds, Jacuzzi and a swimming pool. LEISURE CENTRE- Opened June 1976. The centre offers many sports from martial arts to badminton. It has a large and small pool. It offers squash courts, fitness room, sauna, gymnasium and sports injuries clinic. Outdoors there are tennis courts, an all weather and a floodlit area. Our school and many others use it. In the holidays there extra events for the children. The area offers golf and cricket clubs, as well as music and drama clubs, Scouts, Guides, Cubs and Brownies.
